item.title: QGIS Grant Program - Part 1: QGIS Server, OGC tests and continuous integration
item.description: Introduction Every year, QGIS.org provides funding for improving the QGIS ecosystem on too often neglected subjects like refactoring, packaging or upstream studies.

item.title: QGIS Server and OGC API Features
item.description: "QGIS Server is dead simple to setup and ready to be OGCAPIF certified!
